segments.text: I'm watching this scene unfold, and I can hardly believe my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing there, calmly drying a plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a literal flood happening at her feet, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so incredibly inattentive to their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a waste of water, a messy situation, and a safety hazard all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are up to no good, raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is practically begging to tip over, it's so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is right there, encouraging the whole dangerous enterprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is just asking for trouble and a huge cleanup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to take control here before things get truly out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm actually getting quite frustrated just watching it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a chaotic mess in what should be a peaceful kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
